metadata.description: Additional metadata related to the report period.

id.description: The unique identifier for the metadata.

fromDate.description: The start date of the report period.

toDate.description: The end date of the report period.

metrics.description: Various performance metrics for the campaign.

impressions.description: The total number of impressions generated by the campaign.

clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the campaign.

totalConversions.description: The total number of conversions across all periods.

conversions.description: The total number of conversions from the campaign.

viewConversions.description: The total number of conversions from view interactions.

spend.description: The total amount spent on the campaign.

ecpc.description: The effective cost per click for the campaign.

ctr.description: The click-through rate of the campaign.

conversionRate.description: The rate at which clicks lead to conversions.

viewConversionRate.description: The rate at which views lead to conversions.

cpa.description: The cost per acquisition for the campaign.

totalCpa.description: The total cost per acquisition across all periods.

totalSumValue.description: The total sum value generated across all periods.

sumValue.description: The sum value generated by the campaign.

viewSumValue.description: The sum value generated from view conversions.

totalAverageValue.description: The total average value generated by the campaign.

averageValue.description: The average value generated by the campaign.

viewAverageValue.description: The average value generated from view conversions.

totalRoas.description: The total return on ad spend across all periods.

roas.description: The return on ad spend for the campaign.

videoReachedFirstQ.description: The number of video views that reached the first quartile.

videoReachedSecondQ.description: The number of video views that reached the second quartile.

videoReachedThirdQ.description: The number of video views that reached the third quartile.

videoReachedCompletion.description: The number of video views that reached completion.

videoViewDuration.description: The total duration of video views during the campaign.

videoAvgViewDuration.description: The average duration of video views during the campaign.

videoPlays.description: The total number of video plays during the campaign.

marketer_id.description: The unique identifier for the marketer associated with the campaign.

campaign_id.description: The unique identifier for the campaign.
